data.title: Sensing Decisions: Perceiving, Classifying, Finessing
data.meta_description: This chapter explores the ‘sensor strategies’ being devised to optimize object-recognition processes, critical to gifting autonomous vehicles their perceptive qualities. Although such sensor work is already necessary for the capture of ML training data in...
